price: Na kwa yakini tumeisarifu kati yao wapate kukumbuka. Lakini watu wengi wanakataa ila kukufuru.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
footnotes: Na hii Qur'ani tumeibainisha na tumeisarifu, tumeifanya, ili watu wamkumbuke Mola wao Mlezi, na wawaidhike, na watende kwa mujibu wake. Lakini wengi wa watu wanakataa isipo kuwa ukafiri na inda tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnāhu baynahum liyadhakkarū fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
